TriggerOraclev10g.name: FC_ITEM_MAST_AU
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
IF :NEW.safety_stk_adj IS NOT NULL THEN
IF :NEW.safety_stk_adj != NVL(:OLD.safety_stk_adj,0) THEN
INSERT INTO aps_rqst_queue (item_nbr)
VALUES (:NEW.item_nbr) ;
END IF;
ELSE
IF :OLD.safety_stk_adj IS NOT NULL THEN
INSERT INTO aps_rqst_queue (item_nbr)
VALUES (:NEW.item_nbr) ;
END IF;
END IF;
END fc_item_mast_au ;
